RelatedSentence: PHOENIX ( AP ) -- The son of a U.S. Army soldier from Tucson who died from wounds suffered in Afghanistan says his father 's role in the 2003 rescue of former prisoner of war Jessica Lynch was just one facet of what he achieved in his life .
